info.description: TODO: Please specify the description of this service
info.title: Product Service Service API

post.description: Create the Product specified within the body of this request.  The created Product will be returned.

parameters.name: productId
parameters.description: ID of the product for which the request is being made

parameters.name: tenantId
parameters.description: ID of the tenant for which the request is being made

parameters.name: entityId
parameters.description: ID of the entity for which the request is being made

parameters.name: newProductV1
parameters.description: A new Product to be created

get.description: Risk Match has Updated the Product specified by the id provided in the URL. The updated Product will be returned.

parameters.name: productId
parameters.description: ID of the product for which the request is being made

parameters.name: tenantId
parameters.description: ID of the tenant for which the request is being made

parameters.name: entityId
parameters.description: ID of the entity for which the request is being made

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the Product to replace or 0 for all products

get.description: Retrieves the Product specified by the id provided.

parameters.name: productId
parameters.description: ID of the product for which the request is being made

parameters.name: tenantId
parameters.description: ID of the tenant for which the request is being made

parameters.name: entityId
parameters.description: ID of the entity for which the request is being made

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the Product to get

put.description: Update the Product specified by the id provided in the URL. The updated Product will be returned.

parameters.name: productId
parameters.description: ID of the product for which the request is being made

parameters.name: tenantId
parameters.description: ID of the tenant for which the request is being made

parameters.name: entityId
parameters.description: ID of the entity for which the request is being made

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the Product to replace

parameters.name: newProductV1
parameters.description: A Product to replace the existing Product

get.summary: Retrieve lots of Product by id
get.description: Retrieves the Products specified by ids provided

parameters.description: ID of the entity for which the request is being made

parameters.name: ids
parameters.description: The ids to search by

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: The maximum number of items to include in the response

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page of items to retrieve

method.description: The method of paging that this pagingInfo contains

numberOfElements.description: The number of data elements in this response.

page.description: The page number of the response.

pageSize.description: The page size of this response.

totalPages.description: The total number of pages, based on the pageSize and totalElements

error.description: This field will contain information about the error if one occurred

requestId.description: The unique ID of this request.

spanId.description: The unique ID of the span.

traceId.description: The unique ID of the trace.

isConsultingService.description: Is a policy of this product a consulting service or not

isExternalizedFee.description: Is the product an externalized fee or not

isPackage.description: Is the product a package or not

isRenewable.description: Is a policy of this product renewable or not

key.description: Unique product key, should not change

parentId.description: The id of the parent, or null if it is a parent

parentKey.description: Unique product parentKey, should not change

error.description: This field will contain information about the error if one occurred

requestId.description: The unique ID of this request.

spanId.description: The unique ID of the span.

traceId.description: The unique ID of the trace.
